mapper.delete: delete from tb_rsv_msg where shop_id=#{currShopId} and sale_id=#{saleId} and rsv_dt=#{rsvDt}
mapper.select: select msg_id, rsv_dt, rsv_tp, msg_tp, msg_st from tb_rsv_msg where shop_id=#{currShopId} and sale_id=#{saleId}

SELECT sl.cust_nm, msg_st, msg_tp, IF(rm.rsv_tp != 2, 'D', 'M') as dday_tp, dday FROM tb_rsv_msg rm LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_sale sl on sl.sale_id= rm.sale_id WHERE rm.shop_id= #{currShopId} and rsv_dt=#{date}
